title: Trump's Ongoing Wall Battle & Fallout from the Government Shutdown | John David Washington
itunes:title: Trump's Ongoing Wall Battle & Fallout from the Government Shutdown | John David Washington
description:
President Trump visits the southern border as the government shutdown continues, Trevor addresses a casting controversy, and John David Washington discusses "BlacKkKlansman."
